mapper.sql: pro.id as pro_id, pro.member_code as pro_member_code, pro.member_name as pro_member_name, pro.program_code as pro_program_code, pro.title as pro_title, pro.status as pro_status, pro.product_code as pro_product_code, pro.create_time as pro_create_time, pro.update_time as pro_update_time
mapper.insert: insert into member_program (member_code, member_name, program_code, title, status, product_code, create_time, update_time) values (#{memberCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{programCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
